description: Stylesheet for managing themes and layout for a web application, including light and dark theme variables, responsive design rules, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, setting primary styles including background color and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for branding/logo image with specific height settings and animation rules.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for header styling, including background color, layout properties, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for styling links with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the theme toggle button, including styles for position, background, text color, and hover effects.
